data_table.description: Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: STRC2
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Hospital chart located ? Q2 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC7
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Transcribe discharge diagnoses exactly as they appear on face sheet and/or on discharge summary: diagnosis transcribed? Q7 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC9
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Gender. Q9 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC11
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Was the patient transferred from or to another acute care hospital. Q11 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC15
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Discharged alive or dead ? Q15 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC16
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Time between symptoms & death. Q16 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC17
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Did the discharge diagnosis include any 430, 431, 432, 433, 434, or 436 codes? Q17 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC18
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Neurologic signs last > 24 hours. Q18 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC19A
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were there new neurological symptoms/signs leading to or present upon admission to this hospital? Q19a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC20
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Did new neurological symptoms/signs develop during this hospitalization? Q20 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC22
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Was the onset of the predominant neurologic symptom(s)/sign(s) either sudden or rapid? Q22 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC23
variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of prior stroke. Q23 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC26
variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of prior transient ischemic attack. Q26 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC28
variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of myocardial infarction prior to the onset of this event. Q28 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29A
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Myocardial infarction. Q29a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29B
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Intracardiac thrombus/tumor. Q29b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29C
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Atrial fibrillation. Q29c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29D
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Rheumatic heart disease, valvular heart disease (e.g., mitral stenosis, artificial heart valve). Q29d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29G1
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Hematologic abnormality: hypercoagulable state e.g., DIC. Q29g1 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29G2
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Hematologic abnormality: hemorrhagic e.g., leukemia, thrombocytopenia, DIC. Q29g2 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29H
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Brain tumor (benign or malignant, primary or metastatic). Q29h [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29I
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Major head trauma, e.g., subdural hematoma, epidural hematoma, skull fracture. Q29i [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC29J
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Are any of the following conditions documented as having been present within four weeks prior to or during this hospitalization? Another nonstroke disease process which likely caused a focal neurologic deficit or coma. Q29j [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC30A
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were any of the following performed or present in the week prior to the onset of acute neurologic symptoms? Cardiac catherization. Q30a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC30B
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were any of the following performed or present in the week prior to the onset of acute neurologic symptoms? Open heart surgery. Q30b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC30C
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were any of the following performed or present in the week prior to the onset of acute neurologic symptoms? Cerebral angiography. Q30c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC30D
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were any of the following performed or present in the week prior to the onset of acute neurologic symptoms? Carotid endarterectormy. Q30d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC30E
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Were any of the following performed or present in the week prior to the onset of acute neurologic symptoms? Therapy with anticoagulants (Heparin, Warfarin (Coumadin)). Q30e [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC31A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Headache. Q31a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC31B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Headache severity. Q31b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC31C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Headache duration. Q31c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC32A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Vertigo. Q32a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC32B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Vertigo duration. Q32b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC33A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Convulsions. Q33a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC33B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Convulsions 1st symptom. Q33b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC34
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Meningeal signs: Stiff neck (nuchal rigidity); limitation on leg extension, neck flexion (Kernig, Brudzinski). Q34 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC35A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Coma, unconsciousness, stupor occurring within 12 hours after onset of the neurologic event. Q35a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC35B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Coma/stupor duration. Q35b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC36A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Aphasia. Q36a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC36B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Aphashia duration. Q36b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC38A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Hemianopia. Q38a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC38B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Hemianopia duration. Q38b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC39A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Diplopia. Q39a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC39B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Diplopia duration. Q39b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC40A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Dysphagia (difficulty in swallowing), dysarthria, dysphonia, or tongue deviation. Q40a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC40B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Dysphagia duration. Q40b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC41A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Weakness, paresis or paralysis affecting the face. Q41a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC41B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Facial side affected. Q41b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC41C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Facial paresis duration. Q41c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC42A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Weakness, paresis or paralysis affecting the extremities. Q42a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC42B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Arm side affected. Q42b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC42C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Leg affected. Q42c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC42D
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. What was the duration of the weakness, paresis, or paralysis affecting the extremities? Q42d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC43A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Loss of sensation, tingling, paresthesias, hemianesthesia affecting the face. Q43a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC43B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Face loss sensation side affected. Q43b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC43C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Face loss sensation duration. Q43c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC44A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Loss of sensation, tingling, paresthesias, hemianesthesia affecting the extremities. Q44a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC44B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Arm affected. Q44b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC44C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Leg affected. Q44c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC44D
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. What was the total duration of the loss of sensation, tingling, paresthesias, hemianesthesia affecting the extremities? Q44d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC45A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Gait disturbance. Q45a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC45B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Gait disturbance duration. Q45b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC46A
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Cranial nerve palsy. Q46a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC46B
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Other neurologic symptom. Q46b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC46C
variable.description: [Physician documentation of new symptoms or signs present on or leading to this admission, or occurring during hospitalization]. Did any neurologic sign/symptom last > 24 hours or did death occur < 24 hours after onset of new sign/symptom? Q46c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Lumbar puncture performed. Q47a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47C
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Was lumbar puncture traumatic ? Q47c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Fluid appearance. Q47d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC12Y
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Date of hospital arrival l: year. Q12 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC14Y
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Date of discharge or death: year. Q14 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC21Y
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Did new neurological symptoms/signs develop during this hospitalization? Date of onset of current neurological event: year. Q21 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC11BY
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Was the patient transferred from or to another acute care hospital. Date of admission to that hospital: year. Q11b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47BY
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Lumbar puncture performed. Date: year. Q47b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC13A
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Time of hospital arrival. Q13a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC13AH
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Time of hospital arrival: hours. Q13a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC13AM
variable.description: [Hospital information]. Time of hospital arrival: minutes. Q13a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47E
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Microscopic RBCs tube 1. Q47e [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47F
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Microscopic RBCs tube 2. Q47f [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC47G
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Lumbar puncture diagnosis. Q47g [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC48A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Cerebral angiography performed. Q48a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC48C
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Angiography diagnosis. Q48c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC48D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Stenosis right internal carotid. Q48d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC48E
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Stenosis left internal carotid. Q48e [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC49A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Was at least one CT scan performed during this hospitalization? Q49a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC49B
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. What was approximate time between symptom onset and the first CT scan? Q49b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC49D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. CT diagnosis - first. Q49d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]
variable.value: Normal study, but done within 48 hrs of symptom onset
Ischemic infarction, with no evidence of hemorrhage

variable.name: STRC50A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Were two or more CT scans performed during this hospitalization? Q50a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC50B
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. What was approximate time between symptom onset and the last CT scan? Q50b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC50D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Last CT diagnosis. Q50d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]
variable.value: Normal study, but done within 48 hrs of symptom onset
Ischemic infarction, with no evidence of hemorrhage

variable.name: STRC51A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Were any other CT scans performed after the onset of acute neurologic symptoms/signs, but before admission to this hospital? Q51a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC51B
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. What was approximate time between symptom onset and the first CT scan prior to this hospitalization? Q51b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC51D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Pre-admission CT diagnosis. Q51d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]
variable.value: Normal study, but done within 48 hrs of symptom onset
Ischemic infarction, with no evidence of hemorrhage

variable.name: STRC52A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. MRI including head performed. Q52a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC52B
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. What was approximate time between symptom onset and the MRI? (If > 1 MRI, pick the most meaningful.) Q52b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC52D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. MRI diagnosis. Q52d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]
variable.value: Normal study, but done within 48 hrs of symptom onset
Ischemic infarction, with no evidence of hemorrhage

variable.name: STRC53A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Was B-mode and/or Doppler ultrasound on carotid(s) performed? Q53a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC53C
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Ultrasound diagnosis right carotid. Q53c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC53D
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Ultrasound diagnosis left carotid. Q53d [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC54A
variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Craniotomy performed. Q54a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Additional forms to be filled our]. STRQ11=y Q58 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Additional forms to be filled our]. DTHQ15=d Q59 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC61
variable.description: [Additional forms to be filled our]. Autopsy Xeroxed 55a=y Q61 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Stenosis percentage right. Q48d1 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Stenosis percentage left. Q48e1 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Stenosis percentage left carotid. Q53d1 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Cerebral angiography performed. Date: year. Q48b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Date of first CT scan: year. Q49c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. What was approximate time between symptom onset and the MRI? (If > 1 MRI, pick the most meaningful.). Date: year. Q52c [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Was B-mode and/or Doppler ultrasound on carotid(s) performed? Date: year. Q53b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Craniotomy performed. Date: year. Q54b [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Additional forms to be filled our]. Abstractor number. Date abstracted: year. Q57 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: STRC62
variable.description: [Additional forms to be filled our]. STRD62 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of prior stroke. Month/year of first stroke: year. Q24 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of prior stroke. Month/year of most recent stroke: year. Q25 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Hospital information]. History of prior transient ischemic attack. Month/year of first transient ischemic attack: year. Q27a [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.description: [Laboratory tests performed this admission]. Cerebral angiography performed. Q48 [Cohort Stroke Abstraction Form]

variable.name: FUSTR12
variable.description: Follow up days for STRC12 (DATE OF HOSPITAL ARRIVAL) from exam 1

variable.description: Follow up days for STRC14 (DATE OF DISCHARGE OR DEATH) from exam 1
